name: Guru Ventures, Inc.
description: Provider of an outside-the-home services marketplace intended to connect consumers with professionals. The company's services include recurring mowing, yard clean-ups, seeding, mulching, weeding, and snow clearing among others, enabling customers to book services instantly, using an artificial intelligence-powered satellite mapping tool, or request competitive quotes from top-rated crews nearby
one_liner: Provider of an outside-the-home services marketplace intended to connect consumers with professionals. The company's services include recurring mowing, yard clean-ups, seeding, mulching, weeding, and snow clearing among others, enabling customers to book services instantly, using an artificial intelligence-powered satellite mapping tool, or request competitive quotes from top-rated crews nearby
